select count(*) from reserv where hotel_no= #{hotel_no} and use_status = 0

select ifnull(total_price, 0) from (select * from calendar where dt = substr(now(),1,10)) a left join (select substr(now(),1,10) as date, sum(total_price) as total_price from reserv where substr(rev_date, 1,10) = substr(now(),1,10 ) and hotel_no = #{hotel_no}) b on a.dt = b.date

select ifnull(b.total_price,0) as total_price from (select * from calendar where dt between DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) and now()) a left join (select substring( rev_date,1,10) as date, sum(total_price) as total_price from reserv where rev_date between DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -6 DAY) and now() and hotel_no = 292 group by substring( rev_date,1,10)) b on a.dt = b.date

select ifnull(b.total_price, 0 ) from (select month(dt) as months from calendar where substring(dt,1,7) between concat(substring(now(), 1,4),"-01") and concat(substring(now(), 1,4),"-12") group by months) a
left join
(select month(rev_date) as months, sum(total_price) as total_price from reserv where hotel_no=#{hotel_no} and use_status = 1 group by month(rev_date) order by months) b on a.months = b.months

select ifnull( b.total_price,0 ) from (select week(dt) as weeks from calendar where dt between date_add(now(), INTERVAL - 4 week) and now() group by week(dt) order by weeks) a left join (select week(rev_date) as weeks, sum(total_price) as total_price from reserv where hotel_no= #{hotel_no} group by weeks order by weeks) b on a.weeks = b.weeks;
